circumstances:
The airplane departed RAF Scampton on the evening of November 8 on an operation to Munich. While returning to base at night, the crew abandoned the aircraft that crashed 4 miles west of RAF Hemswell. The aircraft was destroyed and all four crew members were uninjured. 
Crew:
P/O J. A. Munday, 
Sgt F. A. Constable, 
Sgt R. L. Thomas, 
Sgt T. Bale.
